text: Gianrico Tedeschi (20 April 1920 â€“ 27 July 2020) was an Italian actor. He was born in Milan, Italy. His career lasted between 1943 and 2013. He appeared in over 100 movies and television shows. His best known roles were in Susanna Whipped Cream, Il merlo maschio and in Dr. Jekyll Likes Them Hot. In April 2020, Tedeschi celebrated his 100th birthday. He died three months later on 27 July 2020 at his home in Pettenasco, Italy from congestive heart failure.E' morto Gianrico Tedeschi ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1920 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:Italian centenarians Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Actors from Milan
title: Gianrico Tedeschi
